Name: ImageInformation
SummaryComment: A reference to an Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace Image and additional information about the Image.

Key.Name: NodeAgentSkuId
Key.SummaryComment: The ID of the node agent SKU which the Image supports

Key.Name: ImageReference
Key.SummaryComment: The reference to the Azure Virtual Machine's Marketplace Image.

Key.Name: OSType
Key.SummaryComment: The type of operating system (e.g. Windows or Linux) of the Image.

Key.Name: VerificationType
Key.SummaryComment: Whether the Azure Batch service actively verifies that the Image is compatible with the associated Node Agent SKU.

Key.Name: BatchSupportEndOfLife
Key.SummaryComment: The time when the Azure Batch service will stop accepting create pool requests for the Image.

Key.Name: Capabilities
Key.SummaryComment: The capabilities or features which the Image supports.
Key.RemarksComment: Not every capability of the Image is listed. Capabilities in this list are considered of special interest and are generally related to integration with other features in the Azure Batch service.
